com.namics.oss.spring.support.i18n

Class AbstractDaoMessageSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.context.support.MessageSourceSupport
      • org.springframework.context.support.AbstractMessageSource
        • com.namics.oss.spring.support.i18n.AbstractDaoMessageSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Reloadable, org.springframework.context.HierarchicalMessageSource, org.springframework.context.MessageSource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DaoMessageSource, EhCacheDaoMessageSource, NoCacheDaoMessageSource

    public abstract class AbstractDaoMessageSource
extends org.springframework.context.support.AbstractMessageSource
implements Reloadable
    MessageSource that resolves the messages from a configurable DAO Object, needs to be implemented.
    Since:
    Namics commons i18n 1.2 - Oct 14, 2010
    Author:
    aschaefer, namics ag

      • getMessageForLocale

        protected String getMessageForLocale(String code,
                                     Locale locale)
        Resolves Message for a certain locale according to fallback scenarios.
        Parameters:
        code - code of message to resolve
        locale - locale to resolve the message for
        Returns:
        the message string from backend to be used as MessageFormat

        protected String getFallback(String code,
                             Locale locale)

        code - code to resolve message
        locale - language to get the message for
        Returns:
